title: Power adjustment method for hybrid energy storage photovoltaic power station
assignees: STATE GRID XINYUAN ZHANGJIAKOU SCENERY STORAGE DEMONSTRATION POWER PLANT CO Ltd
State Grid Corp of China SGCC

events.title: Application filed by North China Electric Power University

classifications.description: Power conversion systems, e.g. maximum power point trackers

abstract: A power regulation method for a hybrid energy storage photovoltaic power station, which detects the DC bus voltage of the photovoltaic power station in real time and the voltages of the supercapacitor bank and the lithium battery pack connected to the DC bus through two bidirectional DC/DC controllers in real time during the operation of the photovoltaic power station , real-time detection of the active output of the photovoltaic power supply, and at the same time quickly calculate the output value of the supercapacitor bank and lithium battery bank required to achieve the power quality control target of the photovoltaic power station or complete the scheduling task, and control the two-way DC/DC controllers according to the calculation results The operating state, so as to realize the control of the charging and discharging process of the supercapacitor bank and lithium battery pack. The invention fully utilizes the advantages of high energy density of lithium batteries, high cycle life and high power density of supercapacitors, and can well solve the problems of poor power quality and difficulty in participating in grid scheduling in photovoltaic power plants connected to the grid. Apps paved the way.
abstract_original: 一种混合储能光伏电站的功率调节方法，它在光伏电站运行过程中实时检测其直流母线电压及分别通过两个双向DC/DC控制器与直流母线相连的超级电容器组和锂电池组的电压，实时检测光伏电源的有功出力，同时快速计算达到光伏电站电能质量调控目标或完成调度任务所需超级电容器组和锂电池组的出力值，并根据计算结果控制两个双向DC/DC控制器的运行状态，从而实现对超级电容器组和锂电池组充放电过程的控制。本发明充分发挥了锂电池能量密度大和超级电容器循环寿命高、功率密度大的优点，可以很好地解决光伏电站并网运行存在的电能质量差和参与电网调度困难的问题，为光伏电站的推广应用铺平了道路。
claims:
1.一种混合储能光伏电站的功率调节方法，它采用超级电容器和锂电池构成光伏电站混合储能系统，其特征在于，所述方法在光伏电站运行过程中实时检测其直流母线电压及分别通过两个双向DC/DC控制器与直流母线相连的超级电容器组和锂电池组的电压，实时检测光伏电源的有功出力，同时快速计算达到光伏电站电能质量调控目标或完成调度任务所需超级电容器组和锂电池组的出力值，并根据计算结果控制两个双向DC/DC控制器的运行状态，从而实现对超级电容器组和锂电池组充放电过程的控制。
		1. A power regulation method for a hybrid energy storage photovoltaic power station, which uses supercapacitors and lithium batteries to form a hybrid energy storage system for photovoltaic power stations, characterized in that the method detects its DC bus voltage and its respective Through two bidirectional DC/DC controllers connected to the voltage of the supercapacitor bank and the lithium battery bank connected to the DC bus, real-time detection of the active power output of the photovoltaic power supply, and at the same time quickly calculate the supercapacitor required to achieve the power quality control target of the photovoltaic power station or complete the scheduling task The output value of the battery pack and the lithium battery pack, and control the operation status of the two bidirectional DC/DC controllers according to the calculation results, so as to realize the control of the charging and discharging process of the super capacitor bank and the lithium battery pack.

2.根据权利要求1所述混合储能光伏电站的功率调节方法，其特征在于，它按照以下步骤进行：
		2. The power regulation method of the hybrid energy storage photovoltaic power station according to claim 1, characterized in that it is carried out according to the following steps:
		
      
      
         a. 在光伏电站运行过程中实时检测超级电容器组、锂电池组和直流母线的电压，实时检测光伏电源的有功出力，并根据电网调度要求确定由超级电容器组和锂电池组构成的混合储能系统的运行模式是电能质量调控模式还是主动可调度模式；
		a. Real-time detection of the voltage of the super capacitor bank, lithium battery pack and DC bus during the operation of the photovoltaic power station, real-time detection of the active output of the photovoltaic power supply, and determine the hybrid energy storage composed of the super capacitor bank and the lithium battery pack according to the grid dispatching requirements The operating mode of the system is the power quality control mode or the active dispatchable mode;
		
      
      
         b. 混合储能系统出力值的确定：
		b. Determination of the output value of the hybrid energy storage system:
		
      
      
         ①、如果电网调度要求混合储能系统的运行模式为电能质量调控模式，将控制目标设定为保证直流母线供电系统的高质量稳定；首先判断直流母线电压是否满足电能质量标准要求，如果满足电能质量标准要求、则混合储能系统原有控制状态不变；如果不满足电能质量标准要求，控制规则分为两种：若直流母线电压低于标准下限，即低于额定电压的95%，则对混合储能系统进行发电控制；若直流母线电压高于标准上限，即高于额定电压的105%，则对混合储能系统进行充电控制；混合储能系统的发电功率和充电功率流经双向DC/DC控制器Ⅰ和双向DC/DC控制器Ⅱ，其出力大小和方向取决于双向DC/DC控制器Ⅰ和Ⅱ中电力电子器件的控制方法；
		①. If the power grid dispatching requires the operation mode of the hybrid energy storage system to be the power quality control mode, set the control target to ensure the high quality and stability of the DC bus power supply system; first judge whether the DC bus voltage meets the requirements of the power quality standard. If the quality standard requirements, the original control status of the hybrid energy storage system remains unchanged; if the power quality standard requirements are not met, the control rules are divided into two types: if the DC bus voltage is lower than the standard lower limit, that is, lower than 95% of the rated voltage, then Control the power generation of the hybrid energy storage system; if the DC bus voltage is higher than the standard upper limit, that is, higher than 105% of the rated voltage, then control the charging of the hybrid energy storage system; the power generation and charging power of the hybrid energy storage system flow through two-way DC/DC controller Ⅰ and bidirectional DC/DC controller Ⅱ, the magnitude and direction of its output depends on the control method of the power electronic devices in bidirectional DC/DC controller Ⅰ and Ⅱ;
		
      
      
         若直流母线运行电压为UD、额定电压为UN、直流母线端短路阻抗为X，则混合储能系统输出控制功率为：
		If the operating voltage of the DC bus is U D , the rated voltage is U N , and the short-circuit impedance of the DC bus is X, the output control power of the hybrid energy storage system is:
      
      
          ，
		  ,
      
      
         若输出控制功率为正值，表示对混合储能系统进行发电控制；若输出控制功率为负值，表示对混合储能系统进行充电控制；
		If the output control power is a positive value, it means that the hybrid energy storage system is under power generation control; if the output control power is negative, it means that the hybrid energy storage system is under charge control;
		
      
      
         ②、如果电网调度要求混合储能系统的运行模式为主动可调度模式，则将控制目标设定为满足电网调度部门下发的光伏电站发电功率计划，此时对直流母线电压的高质量要求放到次要地位；光伏电站运行过程中，根据实时检测到的光伏电源出力情况、光伏电站发电计划功率、混合储能系统中超级电容器组和锂电池组的运行情况，快速计算出混合储能系统控制策略，并进行相应的调节；混合储能系统的输出控制功率为：
		②. If the power grid dispatching requires the operation mode of the hybrid energy storage system to be an active dispatchable mode, then set the control target to meet the power generation plan of the photovoltaic power station issued by the grid dispatching department. to the secondary position; during the operation of the photovoltaic power station, according to the real-time detection of the photovoltaic power output, the planned power generation power of the photovoltaic power station, and the operation of the supercapacitor bank and lithium battery bank in the hybrid energy storage system, the hybrid energy storage system can be quickly calculated. control strategy, and make corresponding adjustments; the output control power of the hybrid energy storage system is:
		
      
      
         （PC+PB）=PD-PV ，
		(P C +P B )=P D -P V ,
      
      
         储能系统的控制规则为：当PV<PD时，控制混合储能系统发电运行；当PV=PD时，控制混合储能系统待机运行；当PV>PD时，控制混合储能系统充电运行；
		The control rules of the energy storage system are: when P V < P D , control the hybrid energy storage system to generate electricity; when P V = P D , control the hybrid energy storage system to run in standby ; Energy storage system charging operation;
      
      
         c.在每种运行模式下，根据混合储能系统出力值的计算结果，由双向DC/DC控制器Ⅰ和双向DC/DC控制器Ⅱ实时控制超级电容器组和锂电池组的充放电运行状态，实现混合储能系统对光伏电站运行状态的调控；
		c. In each operation mode, according to the calculation result of the output value of the hybrid energy storage system, the charging and discharging operation status of the supercapacitor bank and the lithium battery bank are controlled in real time by the bidirectional DC/DC controller Ⅰ and the bidirectional DC/DC controller Ⅱ , to realize the regulation and control of the operation status of the photovoltaic power station by the hybrid energy storage system;
		
      
      
         d.在每种运行模式下，对混合储能系统的控制采用“超级电容器储能单元优先充电、优先放电”的方式。
		d. In each operation mode, the control of the hybrid energy storage system adopts the method of "supercapacitor energy storage unit priority charging and priority discharge".
